review:
Great . He is very friendly and knowledgeable.  When I got the toothache,  on phone  he has suggested the tab for immediate relief and suggested to visit clinic. 
On visit , he has explained and shown the tooth xray and explain the issue.
After the treatment pain has reduced significantly. 
Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Teeth Replacement with Implants in three days,Teeth Whitening,Cracked Teeth,Re-Root Canal Treatment,
review:
Few Days Before I was suffering with teeth pain. I tried everything but it doesn't worked. Finnally one of my friend suggest me budget clinic. He had done his treatment and he was happy with that.  When I visited first time. Dr. Explained me about my teeth issues. It was so critical. I was so worried about cost of treatment. But when I asked them for treatment cost 
it was not so costly. Then I started my treatment and now I am feeling better. Thanks to budget clinic and Dr. Abhijit Sir. Like name the treatment is in budget. üòä
